mainText:
I remember my first computer an Apple Performa back in 95. I remember
becoming a fanboy from the first days in Graphic Design class. I remember
all the heated arguments with friends, colleagues and even bosses about the
Mac's superiority and how I wasn't going to work on anything but a Mac.

I happened to fall into fixing the mac's at an old job and maintaining two
servers. I unwillingly became the Mac teach, event getting a Mac cert. I now
manage a large website for a great organisation and if it wasn't for
those experiences I wouldn't know half of what I now understand about
computers.

Thank you Steve, the technology industry has lost it's shepard.
author: Rick
